name: Drutt Corporation
overview: Drutt Corporation Inc. provides Mobile Service Delivery Platform (MSDP) solutions to mobile network operators. The MSDP solutions offer an end-to-end multi-channel solution for establishing a mobile service delivery business helping operators to mobilize and charge for any content to any kind of mobile device, over any mobile network and delivery channel. It also provides Drutt 3PI that handles various aspects of content and service integration, as well as partner management; and Drutt Rendering, an engine looking after various device adaptation and content re-purposing to optimize delivery to every mobile device. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden with sales offices in Europe, Asia, North America, Latin America, and the Middle East. As of June 27, 2007, Drutt Corporation Inc. operates as a subsidiary of LM Ericsson Telephone Co.
